title: Operating under pressure
creator_credit: John Richardson, Victorian Pipelines Commission and Kestrel Films (Australia)
brief_description: Construction of the 108-mile pipeline conveying natural gas from Dutson to Dandenong, Victoria. Shows manufacture, welding, testing and laying pipes, discussing problems encountered, and the final turning on of gas.
creator_credit_for_label: John Richardson, Victorian Pipelines Commission and Kestrel Films (Australia)
